features: MULTI-USE AND SPECIALLY FORMULATED TO CLEAN RESIDUE FROM MILK AND FORMULA: Specifically formulated to clean fat, protein and carbohydrate residue, which is commonly found in baby bottles with milk and formula film
RINSES CLEAN AND OFFERS POWERFUL PLANT-BASED CLEANING: Proven to remove up to 50% more milk film and odor than other brands* and rinses clean so no residue remains on baby and children’s items

MINDFUL INGREDIENTS: Pediatrician and dermatologist tested, hypoallergenic, plant-based ingredients and made without harsh chemicals, parabens, sulfates, phthalates, mineral oil, synthetic dyes and fragrances, chlorine, alcohol, SLS, SLES, MEA, DEA, TEA
UNSCENTED & SCENTED VERSIONS: Available in fragrance free, lavender, mango melon, citrus, and apple pear fragrances
CONVENIENT REFILL FORMAT: Available in a refill pouch, which is eco-friendly and made of less plastic than our standard bottles
body.description: Independent tests prove that Dapple Baby Bottle & Dish Soap removes up to 50% more milk film and odor than other leading brands.* It is specifically formulated to remove the fats, proteins and carbohydrates left behind by breast milk and formula so it rinses cleaner, and uses baking soda to combat any odor. It does so much more than just clean bottles – use it on all your dishes, for babies, children and the rest of the family too. Made with plant-based ingredients and without harsh chemicals, Dapple Baby Bottle & Dish Soap received a best-in-class rating from the Clean Label Project for its commitment to clean and pure ingredients. It is hypoallergenic, pediatrician and dermatologist tested and baby-friendly. *Learn more at dapplebaby.com

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Must-Have for Baby Bottle Cleaning!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Dapple Baby Bottle and Dish Liquid Refill Dish Soap, and I couldn't be more pleased with this product. As a parent, it has quickly become an essential item in my kitchen.The fact that this dish soap is plant-based and hypoallergenic is a huge selling point for me. It gives me peace of mind knowing that it's gentle and safe for my baby's bottles and dishes. Plus, it's fragrance-free, which is perfect for sensitive noses.The convenience of having a refill pack is fantastic. It not only reduces waste but also ensures that I always have a fresh supply of this effective dish soap on hand.Speaking of effectiveness, this soap does a remarkable job of removing milk residue and food stains from baby bottles and dishes. It leaves them clean and residue-free without the need for excessive scrubbing.In conclusion, the Dapple Baby Bottle and Dish Liquid Refill Dish Soap is a must-have for any parent. It's safe, effective, and eco-friendly, making it the ideal choice for baby bottle cleaning. I highly recommend this product to all parents looking for a reliable and gentle dish soap for their baby's feeding essentials. It's been a game-changer for us!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gentle and cleans well
reviews.reviewText: We purchased this to clean baby-related items especially because it says that it's good for cleaning milk residues. My experience with many gentle cleansing products is that they are not that good when it comes to cleaning, but this product is effective even though it's gentle.I usually prefer scented items. The Apple Pear scent is okay. It's very mild, so the scent would likely not be offensive to those sensitive to fragrance. I think it's not a good combination for this product though, and the Unscented one seems better.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This review is based off cleaning of formula bottles NOT breast milk.Love this stuff! You only need a dabble (or a dapple😅) of this to make it sud up nicely, it removes formula film and leaves things squeaky clean- I only wish it came with a pump vs squeezing the bottle itself since the soap is a tad thick although I don’t have a genuine complaint about the thickness.I purchased non scented rest assured it does not leave the bottles with any formula scent and honestly smells clean.Overall this may be my new go to!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The best for cleaning a baby bottles. Super fragrance free and a little goes a long way.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the Travel Size
reviews.reviewText: I love that I was able to find this product in the travel size. We are on the go a lot and it fits so nicely in my portable bottle drying rack.My breast milk is thick and fatty which tends to leave a residue on the bottle. One squirt of this, some hot water, and a bottle brush have my bottles clean in no time. It takes the fatty residue off super quickly and easily!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We like this soap to get milk residue off bottles. We use a scrubber with it as well, only for baby dishes, we never mix with other things. It does good and this was cheaper than in store with the completion discount! Doesn’t smell really and gets soapy but doesn’t leave any scent!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Honest Review for dapple baby dish and baby soap
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Dapple Baby Bottle and Dish Soap Dish Liquid is a true essential for parents. Its plant-based composition and hypoallergenic nature make it an ideal choice for baby care. The inclusion of a convenient pump dispenser is a thoughtful feature, simplifying its use during the hectic moments of baby care.What truly impresses me about Dapple is its remarkable efficiency. It effortlessly eliminates persistent milk residues and stubborn food stains, guaranteeing spotless baby bottles and dishes. While the packaging may vary, the unwavering quality remains a constant. The formula is devoid of harsh chemicals, instilling confidence in its safety for my little one.The subtle, pleasing aroma is an added delight, and a small amount goes a long way, ensuring the bottle lasts for an extended period. With its eco-friendly and cruelty-free credentials, Dapple Baby Bottle and Dish Soap is the ultimate choice for conscientious parents who prioritize the best for their baby. I wholeheartedly endorse this product!
